parameters.name: ResourceGroup
parameters.label: Resource Group
parameters.query:
resourceContainers | where type == 'microsoft.resources/subscriptions/resourcegroups'
| project resourceGroup
| sort by resourceGroup asc

content.query: Resources | where type =~ 'Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines' | where resourceGroup in ({ResourceGroup}) | summarize count() by tostring(properties.storageProfile.osDisk.osType)
content.title: Virtual Machine Count per OS Type

content.query: Resources | where resourceGroup in ({ResourceGroup}) | summarize count()
content.title: Resource Number

content.query:
resources
| where resourceGroup in ({ResourceGroup})
| summarize count() by location

Resources 
| extend type = case(
type contains 'microsoft.netapp/netappaccounts', 'NetApp Accounts',
type contains "microsoft.compute", "Azure Compute",
type contains "microsoft.logic", "LogicApps",
type contains 'microsoft.keyvault/vaults', "Key Vaults",
type contains 'microsoft.storage/storageaccounts', "Storage Accounts",
type contains 'microsoft.compute/availabilitysets', 'Availability Sets',
type contains 'microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces', 'Azure Monitor Resources',
type contains 'microsoft.operationsmanagement', 'Operations Management Resources',
type contains 'microsoft.insights', 'Azure Monitor Resources',
type contains 'microsoft.desktopvirtualization/applicationgroups', 'WVD Application Groups',
type contains 'microsoft.desktopvirtualization/workspaces', 'WVD Workspaces',
type contains 'microsoft.desktopvirtualization/hostpools', 'WVD Hostpools',
type contains 'microsoft.recoveryservices/vaults', 'Backup Vaults',
type contains 'microsoft.web', 'App Services',
type contains 'microsoft.managedidentity/userassignedidentities','Managed Identities',
type contains 'microsoft.storagesync/storagesyncservices', 'Azure File Sync',
type contains 'microsoft.hybridcompute/machines', 'ARC Machines',
type contains 'Microsoft.EventHub', 'Event Hub',
type contains 'Microsoft.EventGrid', 'Event Grid',
type contains 'Microsoft.Sql', 'SQL Resources',
type contains 'Microsoft.HDInsight/clusters', 'HDInsight Clusters',
type contains 'microsoft.devtestlab', 'DevTest Labs Resources',
type contains 'microsoft.containerinstance', 'Container Instances Resources',
type contains 'microsoft.portal/dashboards', 'Azure Dashboards',
type contains 'microsoft.containerregistry/registries', 'Container Registry',
type contains 'microsoft.automation', 'Automation Resources',
type contains 'sendgrid.email/accounts', 'SendGrid Accounts',
type contains 'microsoft.datafactory/factories', 'Data Factory',
type contains 'microsoft.databricks/workspaces', 'Databricks Workspaces',
type contains 'microsoft.machinelearningservices/workspaces', 'Machine Learnings Workspaces',
type contains 'microsoft.alertsmanagement/smartdetectoralertrules', 'Azure Monitor Resources',
type contains 'microsoft.apimanagement/service', 'API Management Services',
type contains 'microsoft.dbforpostgresql', 'PostgreSQL Resources',
type contains 'microsoft.scheduler/jobcollections', 'Scheduler Job Collections',
type contains 'microsoft.visualstudio/account', 'Azure DevOps Organization',
type contains 'microsoft.network/', 'Network Resources',
type contains 'microsoft.migrate/' or type contains 'microsoft.offazure', 'Azure Migrate Resources',
type contains 'microsoft.servicebus/namespaces', 'Service Bus Namespaces',
type contains 'microsoft.classic', 'ASM Obsolete Resources',
type contains 'microsoft.resources/templatespecs', 'Template Spec Resources',
type contains 'microsoft.virtualmachineimages', 'VM Image Templates',
type contains 'microsoft.documentdb', 'CosmosDB DB Resources',
type contains 'microsoft.alertsmanagement/actionrules', 'Azure Monitor Resources',
type contains 'microsoft.kubernetes/connectedclusters', 'ARC Kubernetes Clusters',
type contains 'microsoft.purview', 'Purview Resources',
type contains 'microsoft.security', 'Security Resources',
type contains 'microsoft.cdn', 'CDN Resources',
type contains 'microsoft.devices','IoT Resources',
type contains 'microsoft.datamigration', 'Data Migraiton Services',
type contains 'microsoft.cognitiveservices', 'Congitive Services',
type contains 'microsoft.customproviders', 'Custom Providers',
type contains 'microsoft.appconfiguration', 'App Services',
type contains 'microsoft.search', 'Search Services',
type contains 'microsoft.maps', 'Maps',
type contains 'microsoft.containerservice/managedclusters', 'AKS',
type contains 'microsoft.signalrservice', 'SignalR',
type contains 'microsoft.resourcegraph/queries', 'Resource Graph Queries',
type contains 'microsoft.batch', 'MS Batch',
type contains 'microsoft.analysisservices', 'Analysis Services',
type contains 'microsoft.synapse/workspaces', 'Synapse Workspaces',
type contains 'microsoft.synapse/workspaces/sqlpools', 'Synapse SQL Pools',
type contains 'microsoft.kusto/clusters', 'ADX Clusters',
type contains 'microsoft.resources/deploymentscripts', 'Deployment Scripts',
type contains 'microsoft.aad/domainservices', 'AD Domain Services',
type contains 'microsoft.labservices/labaccounts', 'Lab Accounts',
type contains 'microsoft.automanage/accounts', 'Automanage Accounts',
type contains 'microsoft.relay/namespaces', 'Azure Relay',
type contains 'microsoft.notificationhubs/namespaces', 'Notification Hubs',
type contains 'microsoft.digitaltwins/digitaltwinsinstances', 'Digital Twins',
strcat("Not Translated: ", type))
| where resourceGroup in ({ResourceGroup})
| summarize count() by type
| order by count_ desc
//| top 10 by count_
content.title: Resource Number by Type (Top 10)

content.query:
Resources
| where type =~ 'Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines'
| where resourceGroup in ({ResourceGroup})
| project SKU = tostring(properties.hardwareProfile.vmSize)
| summarize count() by SKU
| order by count_ desc
content.title: VM by VM Type/Size

content.query:
advisorresources
| where type == "microsoft.advisor/recommendations"
| where tostring (properties.category) has "Cost"
| where properties.shortDescription.problem has "underutilized"
| where properties.impactedField has "Compute" or properties.impactedField has "Container" or properties.impactedField has "Web"
| project AffectedResource=tostring(properties.resourceMetadata.resourceId),Impact=properties.impact,resourceGroup,AdditionaInfo=properties.extendedProperties,subscriptionId,Recommendation=tostring(properties.shortDescription.problem)
| where resourceGroup in ({ResourceGroup})
content.title: Underused Assets

content.query:
resourcechanges
|Â extendÂ changeTimeÂ =Â todatetime(properties.changeAttributes.timestamp),Â targetResourceIdÂ =Â tostring(properties.targetResourceId),
changeTypeÂ =Â tostring(properties.changeType),Â correlationIdÂ =Â properties.changeAttributes.correlationId,Â 
changedPropertiesÂ =Â properties.changes,Â changeCountÂ =Â properties.changeAttributes.changesCount
|Â whereÂ changeTimeÂ >Â ago(1d)
| where resourceGroup in ({ResourceGroup})
|Â orderÂ byÂ changeTimeÂ desc
|Â projectÂ changeTime,Â targetResourceId,Â changeType,Â correlationId,Â changeCount,Â changedProperties
content.title: All changes in the past one day

content.query:
resourcechanges
|Â extendÂ changeTimeÂ =Â todatetime(properties.changeAttributes.timestamp),Â targetResourceIdÂ =Â tostring(properties.targetResourceId),
changeTypeÂ =Â tostring(properties.changeType),Â correlationIdÂ =Â properties.changeAttributes.correlationId
|Â whereÂ changeTypeÂ ==Â "Delete"
| where resourceGroup in ({ResourceGroup})
|Â orderÂ byÂ changeTimeÂ desc
|Â projectÂ changeTime,Â resourceGroup,Â targetResourceId,Â changeType,Â correlationId
content.title: Resources deleted

content.query:
ResourceContainers
| where type =~ 'microsoft.resources/subscriptions/resourcegroups'
| where resourceGroup in ({ResourceGroup})
| extend TagBool = iff(tags != '' and tags != '[]', "Tagged","Untagged")
| summarize count() by TagBool
//| project resourceGroup, tags
content.title: Resource Groups Tagging Compliance

content.query:
Resources
| where resourceGroup in ({ResourceGroup})
| extend TagBool = iff(tags != '' and tags != '[]', "Tagged","Untagged")
| summarize count() by TagBool
content.title: Resource Tagging Compliance

content.query:
Resources
    | where type =~ 'microsoft.network/networksecuritygroups'
    | project id, nsgRules = parse_json(parse_json(properties).securityRules), networksecurityGroupName = name, subscriptionId, resourceGroup , location
    | mvexpand nsgRule = nsgRules
    | project id, location, access=nsgRule.properties.access,protocol=nsgRule.properties.protocol ,direction=nsgRule.properties.direction,provisioningState= nsgRule.properties.provisioningState ,priority=nsgRule.properties.priority, 
        sourceAddressPrefix = nsgRule.properties.sourceAddressPrefix, 
        sourceAddressPrefixes = nsgRule.properties.sourceAddressPrefixes,
        destinationAddressPrefix = nsgRule.properties.destinationAddressPrefix, 
        destinationAddressPrefixes = nsgRule.properties.destinationAddressPrefixes, 
        networksecurityGroupName, networksecurityRuleName = tostring(nsgRule.name), 
        subscriptionId, resourceGroup,
        destinationPortRanges = nsgRule.properties.destinationPortRanges,
        destinationPortRange = nsgRule.properties.destinationPortRange,
        sourcePortRanges = nsgRule.properties.sourcePortRanges,
        sourcePortRange = nsgRule.properties.sourcePortRange
| extend Details = pack_all()
| project id, location, access, direction, sourceAddressPrefix, sourcePortRange, destinationPortRange, subscriptionId, resourceGroup, Details
content.title: NSG Rules

content.query:
resources 
| where tags =~ '' or tags =~ '{}'
| where type in~ ({ResourceType}) or '*' in~ ({ResourceType})
| where resourceGroup in ({ResourceGroup})
| project Name=id, subscriptionId
content.title: Untagged Resources

content.query:
servicehealthresources
| where type =~ 'Microsoft.ResourceHealth/events'
| extend eventType = properties.EventType, status = properties.Status, description = properties.Title, trackingId = properties.TrackingId, summary = properties.Summary, priority = properties.Priority, impactStartTime = properties.ImpactStartTime, impactMitigationTime = properties.ImpactMitigationTime
| where properties.Status == 'Active' and tolong(impactStartTime) > 1
| project id, description, location, subscriptionId, properties, eventType, status
content.title: AllÂ activeÂ ServiceÂ HealthÂ events

content.query:
securityresources
  | where type =~ 'microsoft.security/locations/alerts'
  | where properties.Status in ('Active')
  | where properties.Severity in ('Low', 'Medium', 'High')
  | extend SeverityRank = case(
    properties.Severity == 'High', 3,
    properties.Severity == 'Medium', 2,
    properties.Severity == 'Low', 1,
    0
   )
  | project-away SeverityRank
  | extend Severity = properties.Severity
  | project Severity = tostring(Severity)
  | summarize Count = count() by Severity
content.title: Severity

content.query:
securityresources
  | where type =~ 'microsoft.security/locations/alerts'
  | summarize Count =count() by resourceGroup
content.title: Resource Group

content.query:
resources
  | project id = tolower(id), tags
  | join kind=inner (securityresources
  | where type =~ "microsoft.security/locations/alerts"
  | extend isAzure = tostring(properties.ResourceIdentifiers) matches regex '"Type"\\s*:\\s*"AzureResource"'
  | extend affectedResourceId = extract('"AzureResourceId"\\s*:\\s*"([^"]*)"', 1, tostring(properties.ResourceIdentifiers))
  | extend hostName = iff(isAzure, "", extract('"HostName"\\s*:\\s*"([^"]*)"', 1, tostring(properties.Entities)))
  | extend splitAffectedResourceId = split(affectedResourceId, "/")
  | extend resourceNameIndex = iff(array_length(splitAffectedResourceId) > 1, array_length(splitAffectedResourceId) - 1, 0)
  | extend affectedResourceName = iff(isAzure, splitAffectedResourceId[resourceNameIndex], iff(isempty(hostName), "Non-Azure", hostName))| project-away resourceNameIndex, splitAffectedResourceId, hostName, isAzure
  | project alertId = id, subscriptionId, alertProperties = properties, affectedResourceId = tolower(affectedResourceId)
    ) on $left.id == $right.affectedResourceId
  | extend id = alertId, subscriptionId, properties = alertProperties
  | where properties.Status in ('Active')
  | where properties.Severity in ('Low', 'Medium', 'High')
  | extend SeverityRank = case(
    properties.Severity == 'High', 3,
    properties.Severity == 'Medium', 2,
    properties.Severity == 'Low', 1,
    0
    )
  | sort by  SeverityRank desc, tostring(properties.SystemAlertId) asc
   | extend Tag = parse_json(tags)
  | mv-expand Tag
 | parse Tag with * ':"' TagValue '"}'
 | project TagValue, alertId
 | summarize Count = count() by TagValue
content.title: Tag

content.query:
datatable(ResourceId: string) [ "All"] | union (securityresources
  | where type =~ 'microsoft.security/locations/alerts'
  | extend Prop = parse_json(properties)
  | where Prop.Severity == "High"
    | extend ResourceIdentifiers = Prop.["ResourceIdentifiers"]
    | project ResourceIdentifiers
  | mv-expand ResourceIdentifiers
  | extend ResourceId = parse_json(ResourceIdentifiers).["AzureResourceId"]
  | where isnotempty(ResourceId )
|  summarize Count=count() by tostring(ResourceId)
  | top 5 by Count)
content.title: Top 5 attacked resources (with High Severity)
content.noDataMessage: There are no Top 5 attacked resources found

content.query:
datatable(AlertDisplayName: string) [ "All"] | union(securityresources
  | where type =~ 'microsoft.security/locations/alerts'
    | extend Prop = parse_json(properties)
  | extend AlertDisplayName = Prop.["AlertDisplayName"]
  | project tostring(AlertDisplayName)
  | summarize Count = count() by AlertDisplayName
  | top 5 by Count)
content.title: Top alert types

content.query:
datatable(AlertDisplayName: string) [ "All"] | union(securityresources
| where type =~ 'microsoft.security/locations/alerts'
| extend Prop = parse_json(properties)
| extend TimeGeneratedUtc = Prop.["TimeGeneratedUtc"]
| extend AlertDisplayName = Prop.["AlertDisplayName"]
| where TimeGeneratedUtc > ago(24h)
| summarize Count=count() by tostring(AlertDisplayName))
content.title: New Alerts (Since last 24hrs)
content.noDataMessage: No new alerts in Last 24 hours

content.query:
securityresources
| where type == "microsoft.security/locations/alerts"
| project-rename P= properties
| extend Details = parse_json(P)
| extend IsIncident = Details.["IsIncident"]
| extend AlertDisplayName = Details.["AlertDisplayName"]
| extend SystemAlertId = Details.["SystemAlertId"]
| extend Severity = tostring(Details.["Severity"])
| where Severity == "High"
| extend AlertUri = Details.["AlertUri"]
| extend Status = tostring(Details.["Status"])
| extend Tactics = tostring(Details.["Intent"])
| extend ResourceIdentifiers = Details.["ResourceIdentifiers"]
| mv-expand ResourceIdentifiers
| extend ResourceId = parse_json(ResourceIdentifiers).["AzureResourceId"]
| where Status == "Active"
| where ("{ResourceIdFilter}" == "All" or ResourceId == "{ResourceIdFilter}") 
    // if either alert name or new alert are set, union those 2 together, if neither are set treat as all
    and (("{AlertDisplayNameFilter}" == "All" and "{NewAlertFilter}" == "All") or AlertDisplayName == "{AlertDisplayNameFilter}" or AlertDisplayName == "{NewAlertFilter}")
| extend SeverityRank = case(
    Severity == 'High', 3,
    Severity == 'Medium', 2,
    Severity == 'Low', 1,
    0
    )
| parse AlertUri with * '/subscriptionId/'  SubscriptionId  '/' *
| parse AlertUri with * '/resourceGroup/'  ResourceGroup  '/' *
| parse AlertUri with * '/location/'  Location  
| project
    Severity,
    SystemAlertId,
    AlertDisplayName,
    IsIncident = iif(IsIncident == "true", "Incident", "Alert"),
    AlertUri,
    Tactics,
    SeverityRank,
    SubscriptionId,
    ResourceGroup,
    Location,
    ResourceId
| sort by SeverityRank
content.title: {$rowCount} Active Alerts

content.query:
securityresources
| where type == "microsoft.security/locations/alerts"
| extend Details = parse_json(properties)
| extend Tactics = Details.["Intent"]
| project Tactics
| extend Tactic = split(Tactics,",")
| mv-expand Tactic
| extend Tactic = trim(" ",tostring(Tactic))
| summarize Count = count() by Tactic
| sort by Count desc

parameters.name: ResourceFilter
parameters.label: Resource
parameters.query:
securityresources
  | where type =~ 'microsoft.security/locations/alerts'
  | extend Prop = parse_json(properties)
  | extend ResourceIdentifiers = Prop.["ResourceIdentifiers"]
    | project ResourceIdentifiers
  | mv-expand ResourceIdentifiers
  | extend ResourceId = parse_json(ResourceIdentifiers).["AzureResourceId"]
  //| where isnotempty(ResourceId )
  | extend Resource = tolower(tostring(ResourceId))
  | summarize count() by Resource
  | project Resource
  //| order by Resource asc

parameters.name: ResourceGroupFilter
parameters.label: Resource group
parameters.query:
securityresources
  | where type =~ 'microsoft.security/locations/alerts'
  | extend resourceGroup = iif(isempty(resourceGroup)," ",resourceGroup)
| summarize Count =count() by resourceGroup
  | project resourceGroup

parameters.name: AlertNameFilter
parameters.label: Alert name
parameters.query:
securityresources
  | where type =~ 'microsoft.security/locations/alerts'
    | extend Prop = parse_json(properties)
  | extend AlertDisplayName = Prop.["AlertDisplayName"]
  | distinct tostring(AlertDisplayName)
  | order by AlertDisplayName asc

parameters.name: TagFilter
parameters.label: Tag
parameters.query:
securityresources
  | where type =~ "microsoft.security/locations/alerts"
    | extend isAzure = tostring(properties.ResourceIdentifiers) matches regex '"Type"\\s*:\\s*"AzureResource"'
  | extend Details = parse_json(properties)
| extend IsIncident = Details.["IsIncident"]
| extend AlertDisplayName = Details.["AlertDisplayName"]
| extend SystemAlertId = Details.["SystemAlertId"]
| extend Severity = Details.["Severity"]
| extend AlertUri = Details.["AlertUri"]
| extend Status = Details.["Status"]
| extend Tactics = Details.["Intent"]
| parse AlertUri with * '/subscriptionId/'  SubscriptionId  '/' *
| parse AlertUri with * '/resourceGroup/'  ResourceGroup  '/' *
| parse AlertUri with * '/location/'  Location  
  | extend affectedResourceId = extract('"AzureResourceId"\\s*:\\s*"([^"]*)"', 1, tostring(properties.ResourceIdentifiers))
  | extend hostName = iff(isAzure, "", extract('"HostName"\\s*:\\s*"([^"]*)"', 1, tostring(properties.Entities)))
  | extend splitAffectedResourceId = split(affectedResourceId, "/")
  | extend resourceNameIndex = iff(array_length(splitAffectedResourceId) > 1, array_length(splitAffectedResourceId) - 1, 0)
  | extend affectedResourceName = iff(isAzure, splitAffectedResourceId[resourceNameIndex], iff(isempty(hostName), "Non-Azure", hostName))| project-away resourceNameIndex, splitAffectedResourceId, hostName
  | extend ResourceIdentifiers = Details.["ResourceIdentifiers"]
    | mv-expand ResourceIdentifiers
  | extend ResourceId = parse_json(ResourceIdentifiers).["AzureResourceId"]
  | extend Resource = tolower(tostring(ResourceId))
  | project alertId = id, subscriptionId, alertProperties = properties, affectedResourceId = tolower(affectedResourceId),tostring(Severity), SystemAlertId, AlertDisplayName,IsIncident = iif(IsIncident=="true","Incident","Alert"),AlertUri,Status,Tactics,SubscriptionId,ResourceGroup,Location, ResourceIdentifier=Details.["ResourceIdentifiers"],Resource
  | join kind=leftouter (
  resources
  | project id = tolower(id), tags
  ) on $left.affectedResourceId == $right.id
 | extend Tag = parse_json(tags)
  | mv-expand Tag
 | parse Tag with * ':"' TagValue '"}'
 | extend TagValue = iif(isempty(TagValue)," ",TagValue)
  | project TagValue, alertId
 | distinct TagValue

content.query:
securityresources
| where type =~ "microsoft.security/locations/alerts"
| extend isAzure = tostring(properties.ResourceIdentifiers) matches regex '"Type"\\s*:\\s*"AzureResource"'
| extend Details = parse_json(properties)
| extend IsIncident = Details.["IsIncident"]
| extend AlertDisplayName = Details.["AlertDisplayName"]
| extend SystemAlertId = Details.["SystemAlertId"]
| extend Severity = Details.["Severity"]
| extend AlertUri = Details.["AlertUri"]
| extend Status = Details.["Status"]
| extend Tactics = Details.["Intent"]
| parse AlertUri with * '/subscriptionId/'  SubscriptionId  '/' *
| parse AlertUri with * '/resourceGroup/'  ResourceGroup  '/' *
| parse AlertUri with * '/location/'  Location  
| extend affectedResourceId = extract('"AzureResourceId"\\s*:\\s*"([^"]*)"', 1, tostring(properties.ResourceIdentifiers))
| extend hostName = iff(isAzure, "", extract('"HostName"\\s*:\\s*"([^"]*)"', 1, tostring(properties.Entities)))
| extend splitAffectedResourceId = split(affectedResourceId, "/")
| extend resourceNameIndex = iff(array_length(splitAffectedResourceId) > 1, array_length(splitAffectedResourceId) - 1, 0)
| extend affectedResourceName = iff(isAzure, splitAffectedResourceId[resourceNameIndex], iff(isempty(hostName), "Non-Azure", hostName))
| project-away resourceNameIndex, splitAffectedResourceId, hostName
| extend ResourceIdentifiers = Details.["ResourceIdentifiers"]
| mv-expand ResourceIdentifiers
| extend ResourceId = parse_json(ResourceIdentifiers).["AzureResourceId"]
| extend Resource = tolower(tostring(ResourceId))
| project
    alertId = id,
    subscriptionId,
    alertProperties = properties,
    affectedResourceId = tolower(affectedResourceId),
    tostring(Severity),
    SystemAlertId,
    AlertDisplayName,
    IsIncident = iif(IsIncident == "true", "Incident", "Alert"),
    AlertUri,
    Status,
    Tactics,
    SubscriptionId,
    ResourceGroup,
    Location,
    ResourceId,
    ResourceIdentifier=Details.["ResourceIdentifiers"],
    Resource
| join kind=leftouter (
    resources
    | project id = tolower(id), tags
    )
    on $left.affectedResourceId == $right.id
| extend id = alertId, subscriptionId, properties = alertProperties
| extend ResourceFilter =" {ResourceFilter}"
| where Resource in~ ({ResourceFilter})
| where Severity in~ ({SeverityFilter})
| where AlertDisplayName in~ ({AlertNameFilter})
| where Status == "Active"
| extend ResourceGroup = iif(isempty(ResourceGroup), " ", ResourceGroup)
| where ResourceGroup in~ ({ResourceGroupFilter})
| extend tag = iff(isempty(tags), dynamic({"tags": " "}), parse_json(tags))
| mv-expand tag
| parse tag with * ':"' TagValue '"}'
| extend TagValue = iif(isempty(TagValue), " ", TagValue)
| where TagValue in ({TagFilter})
| where AlertDisplayName !startswith ('[SAMPLE ALERT]')
| project
    (Severity),
    tostring(SystemAlertId),
    tostring(AlertDisplayName),
    IsIncident = iif(IsIncident == "true", "Incident", "Alert"),
    AlertURI = tostring(AlertUri),
    tostring(Status),
    tostring(Tactics),
    SubscriptionId,
    ResourceGroup,
    Location,
    TagValue,
    tostring(tags),
    tostring(ResourceId)
| distinct
    Severity,
    SystemAlertId,
    AlertDisplayName,
    IsIncident,
    AlertURI,
    Status,
    Tactics,
    SubscriptionId,
    ResourceGroup,
    Location,
    tags,
    ResourceId
| order by Severity asc
content.title: Active Alerts

content.json:
To see more information about the alerts in the map view:

  1. Configure continuous export to export your security alerts to a Log Analytics workspace by following the instructions described [ here. ](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/defender-for-cloud/continuous-export?tabs=azure-portal)
  2. In the "Workspace" filter below, choose the Log Analytics workspace your security alerts are exported to.

parameters.name: Workspace
parameters.query:
resources
| where type contains "solution"
| where name contains "security"
| project id = tostring(properties.workspaceResourceId)
| distinct id

content.query:
securityresources
| where type == "microsoft.security/locations/alerts"
| project-rename P= properties
| extend Details = parse_json(P)
 | extend ResourceIdentifiers = Details.["ResourceIdentifiers"]
| extend IsIncident = Details.["IsIncident"]
| extend AlertDisplayName = Details.["AlertDisplayName"]
| extend SystemAlertId = Details.["SystemAlertId"]
| extend Severity = Details.["Severity"]
| extend AlertLink = Details.["AlertUri"]
| extend Status = Details.["Status"]
| extend Tactics = Details.["Intent"]
| parse AlertLink with * '/subscriptionId/'  SubscriptionId  '/' *
| parse AlertLink with * '/resourceGroup/'  ResourceGroup  '/' *
| parse AlertLink with * '/location/'  Location  
  | mv-expand ResourceIdentifiers
  | extend ResourceId = parse_json(ResourceIdentifiers).["AzureResourceId"]
  | where isnotempty(ResourceId )
| project  Severity, SystemAlertId, tostring(AlertDisplayName),IsIncident = iif(IsIncident=="true","Incident","Alert"),tostring(AlertLink),Status,Tactics,tostring(ResourceId),SubscriptionId,ResourceGroup,Location
| distinct tostring(SystemAlertId),tostring(AlertDisplayName),tostring(AlertLink),tostring(ResourceId)
| summarize count() by ResourceId, AlertLink, AlertDisplayName
content.title: AlertsMapView
